Uses of Package
btClient

  • Classes in btClient used by btClient 
    Class and Description
    ActiveTorrent 
    BencodingException 
    Block
    An object representing a single block within a Piece; This class contains the for this block and keeps track of relevant data pertaining to the block such as
    BtException 
    BtUtils.Status
    Enum indicating the current state of a torrent
    CommunicationTracker
    This class is tasked with handling communications with the torrent tracker, such as establishing a connection, finding peers, and alerting the tracker to the current state of the download
    GUIFrame 
    MessageHandler
    This class is tasked with deciding which piece to download next and handling the messages received from the peer.
    Peer
    This class is tasked with managing the connection with a peer and sending receiving messages between that peer.
    Piece
    This class is tasked with managing a single piece of the downloaded file.
    TorrentInfo
    This is a data structure class that extracts basic information from a bencoded torrent metainfo file and stores it in public fields.  Note that this class only works for torrent metainfo files for a single-file torrent.
